full_text: Knitted pumpkin decoration in DROPS Lima. The piece is worked in English rib. Theme: Halloween. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #dropssquashsquad DROPS Design: Pattern li-217 Yarn group B SIZES : S - M - L Height: 4-5-6 cm. YARN : DROPS LIMA from Garnstudio (belongs to yarn group B) 50 g colour 9021, Brick Red/0707, Rust And use: A left-over of colour Brown if you want a stalk. 1 pumpkin weighs approx. 10-14-28 g. NEEDLES : DROPS DOUBLE POINTED NEEDLES SIZE 3 MM. ACCESSORIES : Wadding. A cinnamon-stick of chosen length if you want the pumpkin to have an opening at the top. KNITTING TENSION : 20 stitches in width and 44 rows in height with English rib on needle size 3 mm = 10 x 10 cm. NOTE: Needle size is only a guide. If you get too many stitches within 10 cm, change to a larger needle size. If you get too few stitches within 10 cm, change to a smaller needle size.
name: Ravelry: 0-1661 Squash Squad pattern by DROPS design
